headline: Will AI-Driven Optical Growth Reshaping Core Profits Change Corning's (GLW) Narrative?
summary: In the third quarter of 2025, Corning reported core revenue of US$4.27 billion, up 14% year over year and ahead of its own forecast, with optical communications revenue climbing 33% on strong AI-related demand. This surge meant enterprise optical communications alone grew 58% year over year and generated more than half of Corning’s total core profit, underscoring how central AI-driven infrastructure spending has become to the company’s earnings mix.
